```{r}
# function that returns the dataframe for a specified day/month
events_fct <- function(df, month, day){
  df1 <- df %>% filter(Month==month & Day==day) %>% mutate(`Percent Change`=((count-Average)/Average)*100) %>% arrange(desc(count)) %>% select(-Latitude.1, -Longitude.1, -X)
  return(df1)
}
```

```{r}
# function on fourth of july
jul_4 <- events_fct(joined_avg_count, 7, 4)
```
